job.title: Senior Cloud Engineer - AWS, AI, ML
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: One of the fastestgrowing and hottest stealth companies in the country Founded in 2020 we are building a platform at the intersection of IoT and AI enabling enterprises to digitize physical environments making them intelligent and controllable and unlocking unimagined opportunities for growth The company boasts a rockstar group of founders including FounderCEO of SmartThings and Head of IoT at Engineering leader for Amazon Alexa AWS and Fire TV and CTO of SmartThings CofounderPresident of ReachLocal and board roles at iD Tech Quartet Health and Music Audience Exchange and VP Engineering of SmartThings and board member at Zigbee AlliancebrbrWe offer an incredible opportunity to work with the best in tech and exciting technologies IoT visual AI Edge computing fielddeployed ML hardware and scaling cloud for tons of events The company is based in San Francisco but has hubs in Dallas and Minneapolis but is hiring remotely Benefits are excellent plus equity for tech talent An excellent engineeringled culture that values good people hard work and talentbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrWork with cloud developers product managers and designers to guide and make technical decisions throughout the development processbrbrLead the architecture and design of our client platformbrbrMentor other developers and contractors throughout the development lifecyclebrbrPrototype unproven concepts to inform final implementationsbrbrStay abreast of cloud trends and topicsbrbrAutomate everything possible Leverages CICD to automate repeatable tasks and quality checksbrbrManaging Infrastructure as CodebrbrManaging and supporting engineering teams release softwarebrbrBuilding the tools and support for teams to be able to selfmanage in an owner operator modelbrbrWhat You Need for this PositionbrbrPassionate for continuous learning and understanding things in and around Cloud developmentbrbrBSMS in Computer Science or equivalent practical experiencebrbr4 years of experience with Cloud technologies and languages Javascript Typescript Python Kotlin Java Nodejs NestJSbrbrAWS Cloud Experience using EC2 Lambda ECS RDS and DocumentDBbrbrExperience building event driven architectures at high scale using KafkabrbrExperience with Infrastructure as code using Terraform amp CloudformationbrbrExperience with high availability deployment across many regions and availability zonesbrbrExperience with SumoLogic DataDog CloudWatch or similar tools for observabilitybrbrDeep experience with Git Github Pull Request and RebasingbrbrAbility to operate in a fastpaced deadlinedriven collaborative and iterative development environmentbrbrAbility to lead and define cloud initiatives with other engineersbrbrExperience working with a highly reactive platformbrbrExperience with establishing promoting and ensuring best practices in Cloud codebases including common architectures and standardized unit testingbrbrExperience building reusable libraries SDKs and shared components used by many applicationsbrbrIntricate knowledge of building and managing Https web services using RESTbrbrstronguPlus not RequiredbrbrustrongExperience with multiple AWS accountsbrbrExperience working with AI ML or ARbrbrExperience with Docker container development and hostingbrbrExperience with growing large teams and can describe the issues that arise with
